Title: Enacts the credit for rural energy infrastructure act of 2025
Summary: Enacts the credit for rural energy infrastructure act of 2025, to provide tax credits for certain activities expanding energy infrastructure into unserved rural areas.
LawCode: Amd §5, Pub Serv L; amd §§210-B & 606, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law and the tax law, in relation to enacting the credit for rural energy infrastructure act of 2025
